Planned to start this blog
A place to create freely? Sounds cool, doesn’t it?＼(~o~)／

Construction completed
Took several days and a couple of resets, but Astra theme finally made it look decent. Struggles build character, right?

Switched to the Sakurairo theme
Adorable, isn’t it?

Changed theme to Argon
Functional and pretty! Still live on my WordPress blog.

Transitioned to full Docker deployment
Docker changes the world—including my blog world!

Moved to Jekyll
A lighter, geekier tool!

Shifted to Hugo
Going global now! ( •̀ ω •́ )✧
